# Smart Wardrobe: Style & Try-On

AI-powered digital wardrobe and virtual try-on system.

Summary
Smart Wardrobe: Style & Try-On helps users organize their real clothes, build outfits using computer vision, and try on garments virtually. It focuses on sustainability, reduced decision fatigue, and personal style logic.

## Technical context
Framework: React Native / Expo
Backend: Firebase Functions, Firestore
Vector search: Qdrant
AI models: Gemini Vertex AI, IDM-VTON3, OOTDiffusion, Fast TFLite

## Core logic
Semantic outfit matching based on weather, intent, body proportions, and personal wardrobe data.

## Resources
- [Resources](https://github.com/HealthyElegant/smart-wardrobe-style-and-try-on)
